text: wla tsddiqu tsdyqana shyhana 'iilaa lman tabie dinakum fakan yhwdyaan, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iina alhudaa waltwfyq hudaa allah wtwfyqh lil'iiman alshyh. wqalu: la tzhru ma eindakum min aleilm lilmuslimin fayataealamun minkum fysawwkm fi aleilm bh, watakun lahum al'afdaliat elykm, 'aw 'an yatakhidhuh hujat eind rabikum yghlbwnkm bha. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iina alfadl waleta' wal'umur klha biad allah wataht tsrfh, ywtyha man yasha' mmn aman bih wbrswlh. wallah wasie elym, yasae bieilmih wetayh jmye mkhlwqath, mmn yastahiqu fadlah wnemh
